EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne Tour_PARENT_2018.Chicago Reminder Send Aug27
EmailTemplate.subject: See you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We look forward to seeing you Tuesday at SpringOne Tour Chicago <[[http://springonetour.io/2018/chicago?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-chicago-q318]]>. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at springonetour@pivotal.io <[[mailto:springonetour@pivotal.io]]> with any questions. Please be sure to bring your government-issued ID, like a driver's license, with you when you check in.
Tuesday, August 28 - Day 1 Agenda
Time
Session
8:00 am
Breakfast/Registration
8:45 am
Welcome
9:00 am
Evolving to Cloud-Native
9:55 am
Spring Boot & Spring Cloud on Pivotal Application Service
11:15 am
Using Spinnaker to Create a Development Workflow on Kubernetes
12:05 pm
Continuous Deployment to the Cloud
1:00 pm
Lunch
2:00 pm
Open Space <[[http://springonetour.io/open-space?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=global-event-springonetour-chicago-q318]]>
5:30 pm
Social & Networking at Tavern at the Park & The Tree House <[[https://tavernatthepark.com/tree-house/visit-tree-house/]]>
7:30 pm
Day Ends

Session
8:00 am

4:10 pm

5:00 pm
Day Ends
Location Summit Executive Center <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Summit+Chicago/@41.885913,-87.624185,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x40ad65c4ee308920?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi3jojNtfzcAhVnpVkKHeUTBR8Q_BIwDXoECAcQCw]]> 205 N Michigan Ave 10th Floor <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Summit+Chicago/@41.885913,-87.624185,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x40ad65c4ee308920?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi3jojNtfzcAhVnpVkKHeUTBR8Q_BIwDXoECAcQCw]]> Chicago, IL 60601 <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/Summit+Chicago/@41.885913,-87.624185,15z/data=!4m2!3m1!1s0x0:0x40ad65c4ee308920?sa=X&ved=2ahUKEwi3jojNtfzcAhVnpVkKHeUTBR8Q_BIwDXoECAcQCw]]>
Accessing the venue:
Please review this document <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/rs/625-IUJ-009/images/ChicagoSummitAccess.png]]> which includes instructions for gaining access to the Summit Executive Center. You will receive a QR code via email that you will scan at the turnstile upon entry. This email will come from Summit Chicago (no-reply@sigateway.com <[[mailto:no-reply@sigateway.com]]>). Please check your spam folder if you do not receive the email.
Parking Info:
- 111 E Wacker Drive & 233 N Michigan Avenue (Enter On Michigan Avenue & South Water Street).
We look forward to seeing you on Tuesday! Tasha Isenberg and the SpringOne Tour Team
